course: APU International Students Scholarships & Merit Awards
university: Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (APU)
scholarshipDetail: Up to 50% until completion of your degree. For example, if you secure a 50% Scholarship based on your 9A’s in SPM, your discount will be 50% for your Foundation Programme and 50% for the entire 3 years (Non-Engineering) or 4 years (Engineering) Degree Programme.

course: APU Postgraduate Master’s Degree Scholarships & Merit Awards
university: Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (APU)
scholarshipDetail: APU Scholarships & Merit Awards for international students are available to new international students on first come first serve basis for up to 30% tuition reduction.
